Section: Number of reported road collisions, by severity, road safety factor, and road safety factor collection method, Great Britain, 10 years up to 2024 [note 4]
Some cells refer to notes which can be found on the notes worksheet.

Fatal or serious collisions are referred to as FSC. This tab contains both data that has been converted from contributory factors and directly recorded as road safety factors, this is indicated in the column names.
Filters are active in row 5 and may hide some data. To turn off all filters select the ‘Data’ ribbon then ‘Filter’ button  or use [Ctrl, Shift, L].
